svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Disease burden from non-communicable diseases vs. GDP per capita, 2016
Disease burden to non-communicable diseases (NCDs), measured in DALYs (Disability-Adjusted LifeYears) lost per
100,000 individuals versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in 2011 international-$.
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease, World Bank – WDI
